pages.text: You've already used your anvil (lots of anvils, to be precise) plenty. However, both $(l:general/anvil_crushing)Item Crushing$(/l), repairing and enchanting tools always damage them so quickly that they become irreparably damaged.$(br)To make the anvil more durable - or even indestructible - Bedrock seems like the perfect choice.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: Allows you to rename items for free and has no maximum repair limit. In addition, you can also add descriptions to your items.$(br)$(italic)Tip: use "\n" to split your text into multiple lines.
